source.0e3c62fe: ### *In this chapter, we see the employment of the Machine Learning Engineers and Data Scientists. Their workplace siza and their Salary*
source.73344425: # *Hello, I am **The Watcher** and I have be assigned to guide you to the advancement of Data Science and Machine Learning. I have taken an oath to not intervene in the matters of human civilization. Lets get started to watch each survey one by one*
source.dfffcc02: ### Again we see that **Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2)** is most used cloud computing product used by the Data Scientists and Machine Learning Engineers
source.bc0c4a82: ### As we see, the most favourite ML algorithm is **Linear or Logistic Regression**, followed by **Decission Tree or Random Forest** and then **Gradient Boosting Machines**
source.f06d3e6a: ### Let us see the different Managed Machine Learning products used by the Data Scientists and ML Engineers
source.88f306b4: ### As we can see there are only few employees in the industry about **0-49 employees** in the industry
source.829fdc44: ### Let us see the industry where the machine learning is applied
source.4987e94b: ### Let us see the different platforms which the data scientists and machine learning engineers use to display their data analysis
source.eb35355d: ### let us first see the best platform from which machine learning can be learnt easily and be applied fast
source.1810ce33: ### In this chapter we will see the Data Storage Products used by the Data Scientist, the Big Data Products and managed machine learning products
source.c8858d2a: # Therefore, **Python** is the most used language to implement Data Science and Machine Learning Algorithms
source.01004a69: ### As you can, **Scikit-learn** is the most preferred framework by machine learning engineers, with **TensorFlow** and **Keras** following.
source.f210896e: ### As stated in the graph, an average yearly compensation to a Data Scientist and a Machine Learning Engineer is about **30,000 to 39,000 USD**
source.b4b273a0: ### As in this stat also shows **Amazon Web Service (AWS)** is the most familiar cloud computing platform among Data Scientist and Machine Learning Engineers
source.89f064a5: ### Let's now see the which is the best Computer Vision Methods used by the Engineers of this civilization
source.46788674: ## As we can see, it consists of more of male than female. But that doesn't mean female are less, their contribution is more than that of male.
source.5b3542e1: ### Therefore **Kaggle Notebooks** are the best source of information on the topic of machine learning and data science
source.861a2ef0: ### **Word embedding** is the most preferred NLP tool by machine learning engineers
source.a4d8a71c: ### In this we will see the programming languages recommended for applying Data Science and Machine Learning Algorithm.
source.a4f668dd: ### Let's begin with the most strong machine learning framework of the civilization.
source.4f87d2b7: ### So this is the end of our survey, we saw different variety of stats, with each containing a story, the story given by each and every Data Scientist and Machine Learning Engineer. In few, some liable resources might have lost among each other. With some winning the most votes. But then, each stat is a belonging of mine, a piece of mine, which I carry and which I shared with you. I am **The Watcher**, and now I say this **"I Break my Oath"** and I shall now Intervene in the development of this civilization.
source.f2ba45ff: ### **Amazon Simple Storage (S3)** is the most famous Data Storage product among the Data Scientists and Machine Learning Engineers
source.303bd93f: ### As it shows, Matplotlib is the most used visiual library used for Data Scientist and Machine Learning Engineers
source.db434f26: ### In this stats after a close look we get to know that **Azure Machine Learning Studio** has won this stats, and had become famous Managed Machine Learning platform
source.2a9e4d7e: ## The **Age** of people working on Data Science and Machine Leaning
source.20bc61de: ### As this histogram shows, most of the machine learning engineers and data scientists don't use tensor processing unit at all to do their work.
source.ee5e3567: ### The best learning platform is **Coursera**, with **Kaggle Learn Couses** coming in second
source.668e1fd9: ### Let us see the different AutoML tools preferred by Data Scientists and Machine Learning Engineers
source.a904d10f: ### From the stat we get the best business tool is **Tableau**
source.a0c30c4c: ### Now we see different integrated development environment(IDE)
